basics.summary: Computer Science student at ETH Z端rich. I'm most interested in Systems Programming, Cyber Security, and Machine Learning. I am always open to collaborating on interesting projects or discussing new ideas in tech. Feel free to connect!

work.name: VIS ETHZ
work.summary: Deploying Applications and helping to manage the VIS clusters.
highlights: Deployed 'Rallly' on the association's local cluster using Kubernetes.
Configured container orchestration and networking for self-hosted student services.
Maintained and monitored on-premise server resources, gaining hands-on Linux administration experience.

work.name: PureGym / Skills Park
work.summary: Ensuring operational excellence and member support in fast-paced environments.
highlights: Developed strong interpersonal and communication skills serving a diverse client base.
Maintained environment safety and equipment functionality.
Managed cash drawer accounting and optimized workflow efficiency with team members.

projects.name: Raw Socket Packet Sniffer
projects.description: A low-level network analysis tool built using raw sockets to capture and analyze Ethernet frames in real-time.
highlights: Manual parsing of Ethernet, IP, TCP, and UDP headers
Custom implementation of the PCAP file format for Wireshark compatibility
Real-time DNS and TCP protocol filtering and payload inspection

projects.name: Neural Network in C
projects.description: A modular neural network built from scratch in pure C, featuring backpropagation, momentum, and gradient checking.
highlights: Advanced training features: L2 Regularization, Momentum

projects.name: Our Place
projects.description: A collaborative digital space featuring real-time media sync, interactive memory maps, and a gamified relationship tracker.

projects.name: Kiroku-TUI
projects.description: A high-performance terminal-based journaling tool in Rust with fuzzy search, Git-sync, and file watching.

projects.name: TCP Port Scanner
projects.description: High-performance, single-file TCP scanner written in C using non-blocking I/O and select().
highlights: Uses non-blocking sockets for precise timeouts
